Question: As a medical researcher, this person was an early user and proponent of cocaine as a stimulant as well as analgesic.
Hints: This person's concept of penis envy was attacked by Kate Millett, whose Sexual Politics accused him of confusion and oversights.
It has been suggested that much of this person's early psychoanalytical theory was a by-product of his cocaine use.
From 1909, Adler's views on topics such as neurosis began to differ markedly from those held by this person.
